Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate two students trying to communicate over a long distance using a string telephone.
The student can include in their drawing a string connecting two cups or similar objects to represent the string telephone.
The student can show that the string telephone uses sound to send and receive information by illustrating sound waves or vibrations along the string.
The student can depict that each end of the string telephone is held by a student, showing the device sends and receives information.
The student can include labels or additional notes explaining how the device uses sound to solve the problem of communication over distance.
The student can illustrate how communicating over a distance can help people by showing a scenario where the string telephone might be useful.
